---
title: "Creating Custom Inline Icons"
css: slides.scss
---

1.  Take a screenshot and save it as a .png file.
2.  Bring it into Adobe Illustrator then load up the "Image Trace" toolbar. Make sure to unclick the preview button, then press Trace once the right settings are there.
![](images/clipboard-1719382083.png)

3. Go to Object -> Artboards -> Fit to Artwork Bounds to resize the canvas.
4. Export to an .svg file.
